comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: From www.thepeerage.com/p5473.htm#i54723: Lt.-Col. Sir John Keane, 5th Bt. married Lady Eleanor Lucy Hicks-Beach, daughter of Michael Edward Hicks-Beach, 1st Earl St. Aldwyn and Lady Lucy Catherine Fortescue, on 14 February 1907. So I think the older lady is his mother, Lady Adelaide Keane, née Sidney, and the other three are his siblings: George Michael Keane b. 30 May 1875 Florence Keane b. 29 Nov 1877 and Lt.-Col. Richard Henry Keane b. 3 May 1881
